name: static-dreamwaves
description: Automated pipeline for generating 3-hour Synthwave/Lo-Fi/Vaporwave mixes
author: Patrick Lake

scripts.setup: python3 -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt && chmod +x scripts/*.sh && chmod +x agent/*.py
scripts.rename:all: yarn rename:phase1 && yarn rename:phase2 && yarn rename:phase3 && yarn rename:phase4
scripts.rename:all:dry: yarn rename:phase1:dry && yarn rename:phase2:dry && yarn rename:phase3:dry && yarn rename:phase4:dry
scripts.status: echo '=== MP3 Files ===' && find arc_library -name '*.mp3' | wc -l && echo '=== Metadata Entries ===' && ./venv/bin/python3 -c 'import json; data = json.load(open("metadata/song_index.json")); print(len(data.get("tracks", {})))' && echo '=== Build History ===' && ./venv/bin/python3 -c 'import json; data = json.load(open("metadata/build_history.json")); print(len(data.get("builds", [])), "builds")'
scripts.clean:metadata: rm -f metadata/phase_*.json metadata/song_index.json metadata/build_history.json && ./venv/bin/python3 -c 'import json; open("metadata/song_index.json", "w").write(json.dumps({"_comment": "Global index", "tracks": {}}, indent=2)); open("metadata/build_history.json", "w").write(json.dumps({"builds": []}, indent=2))'
scripts.clean:all: yarn clean:metadata && yarn clean:logs && yarn clean:rendered
